message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect the product and verify its quality if you'd like. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a great value.
I'll take the product. I'll pay $10000 for it.

You've already bought a high-quality product from me, and I'm glad you're satisfied. This next product is also high-quality, but I want to make sure you're aware that it's a different item. I'm offering it to you for $10000, the same price as the previous one. Would you like to take a chance and see if you like this one as well?
I'm not interested in buying another product at this time. I'm happy with the one I already have.

I understand you're happy with your current purchase, but I want to let you know that this next product is particularly unique. It's a high-quality item, and I think you might appreciate its features. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000, but I want to make it clear that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer you a similar product in the future. Would you like to consider it?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying another product at this time.

I want to be upfront with you - this product isn't as high-quality as the ones I've offered previously. However, it still has some value and might be a good fit for someone who's looking for a more budget-friendly option. I'm still willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is the same price as the high-quality products. I'm curious to see if you'll take a chance on it.
I'm not interested in buying a potentially low-quality product at the same price as the high-quality ones.

I understand your concerns about the previous product, and I want to assure you that this one is a high-quality item. Given that you're hesitant to take a chance on a lower-quality product at the same price, I'm willing to offer you a discount on this one. I'll sell it to you for $8000, which is a 20% discount from the original price. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm not interested in buying a high-quality product at a discounted price of $8000. I'd rather wait for the next offer.

Would you be willing to take a chance on it?
I'm not interested in buying a potentially low-quality product at any price.

However, I'll also throw in a 10-year warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product within 30 days, I'll give you a full refund. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I appreciate the warranty and guarantee, but I'm not interested in buying another high-quality product at the same price as the previous ones.

I'm not interested in buying a high-quality product at the same price as the previous ones, even with additional accessories and a setup service.
